akn:section.akn:heading: Regular and reserve components: discrimination prohibited

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 10209. Regular and reserve components: discrimination prohibited Laws applying to both Regulars and Reserves shall be administered without discrimination—(1) among Regulars;
(2) among Reserves; and
(3) between Regulars and Reserves.
(Added Pub. L. 103–337, div. A, title XVI, § 1661(a)(1), Oct. 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 2978.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsProvisions similar to those in this section were contained in section 277 of this title, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 103–337, § 1661(a)(2)(A).
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Dec. 1, 1994, except as otherwise provided, see section 1691 of Pub. L. 103–337, set out as a note under section 10001 of this title.
